rule.name: CASE_APP_DocColumn
rule.description:
Generates columns given the column type name. Valid column names include
"NAME", "DESCRIPTION", "EXTENSION", "DATECREATED", "LASTUSERTOMODIFY", "TOTALNUMBEROFVERSIONS", "SIZE", "IMAGE",
rule.definition: =choose(wherecontains(upper(ri!columnType), #"_a-0000d9b9-6309-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_1861"), /*NAME*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Name", field: "Name", data: index(ri!datasubset.data, "name", {}), alignment: "LEFT", links: if(ri!LinktoDoc, apply(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: _), index(ri!datasubset.data, "document", {})), {}) ), /*DESCRIPTION*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Description", field: "Description", data: index(ri!datasubset.data, "description", {}), alignment: "LEFT", links: if(ri!LinktoDoc, apply(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: _), index(ri!datasubset.data, "document", {})), {}) ), /*EXTENSION*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Extension", field: "Extension", data: index(ri!datasubset.data, "extension", {}), alignment: "LEFT", links: if(ri!LinktoDoc, apply(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: _), index(ri!datasubset.data, "document", {})), {}) ), /*DATECREATED*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Last Modified", field: "Last Modified", data: index(ri!datasubset.data, "dateCreated", {}), alignment: "LEFT", links: if(ri!LinktoDoc, apply(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: _), index(ri!datasubset.data, "document", {})), {}) ), /*LASTUSERTOMODIFY*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Modified By", field: "Modified By", data: apply(#"_a-0000d9b9-6309-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_1983", index(ri!datasubset.data, "lastUserToModify", {})), alignment: "LEFT", links: apply( #"_a-0000d9b9-6309-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_1876"(user: _), index(ri!datasubset.data, "lastUserToModify", {}) ) ), /*TOTALNUMBEROFVERSIONS*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Versions", field: "Versions", data: index(ri!datasubset.data, "totalNumberOfVersions", {}), alignment: "LEFT", links: if(ri!LinktoDoc, apply(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: _), index(ri!datasubset.data, "document", {})), {}) ), /*SIZE*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Size", field: "Size", data: index(ri!datasubset.data, "size", {}), alignment: "LEFT", links: if(ri!LinktoDoc, apply(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: _), index(ri!datasubset.data, "document", {})), {}) ), /*IMAGE*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridImageColumn"( label: "Type", field: "Images", data: apply( #"_a-0000da89-b5e9-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_3514"(doc: _), if(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isNullOrEmpty"(ri!documents), {}, ri!documents)), size: upper(ri!showDocImageType) ) )
